targets.expr: max by(instance, name, hash, category) (qbittorrent_torrent_info{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent"})
max by(instance, name, hash, state) (qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent"})
max by(instance, name, hash, save_path) (qbittorrent_torrent_save_path{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent"})

max by(name, hash) (
qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent", state="allocating"} *1
or
qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent", state="checkingDL"} *2
or
qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent", state="checkingResumeData"} *3
or
qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent", state="checkingUP"} *4
or
qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent", state=~"downloading|forcedDL|queuedDL"} *5
or
qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent", state=~"error|missingFiles"} *6
or
qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent", state="metaDL"} *7
or
qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent", state=~"uploading|forcedUP|queuedUP"} *8
or
qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent", state="stalledDL"} *9
or
qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent", state="stalledUP"} *10
or
qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent", state="stoppedDL"} *11
or
qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent", state="stoppedUP"} *12
or
qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~"$torrent", state="unknown"} *13
)

panels.description: Can be empty when nothing is uploading
panels.title: Upload Speed by Torrent

panels.description: Can be empty when nothing is uploading
panels.title: Leechers

panels.description: Can be empty when nothing is downloading
panels.title: Download Speed by Torrent

panels.description: Can be empty when nothing is downloading
panels.title: Seeders

list.definition: query_result(count by(human, category) (label_join(count_values by(category) ("count", count_values by(category) ("__", last_over_time(qbittorrent_torrent_info{instance="$instance"}[$__range]))), "human", ": ", "category", "count")))
list.name: category

query.query: query_result(count by(human, category) (label_join(count_values by(category) ("count", count_values by(category) ("__", last_over_time(qbittorrent_torrent_info{instance="$instance"}[$__range]))), "human", ": ", "category", "count")))

list.definition: query_result(count by(name, hash) (last_over_time(qbittorrent_torrent_save_path{instance="$instance", hash=~".*($hash_filter).*", name=~".*(?i:$name_filter).*", save_path=~"($path_prefix).*"}[$__range])) * count by(name, hash) (last_over_time(qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~".*($hash_filter).*", name=~".*(?i:$name_filter).*", state=~"($state).*"}[$__range])) * count by(name, hash) (last_over_time(qbittorrent_torrent_info{instance="$instance", hash=~".*($hash_filter).*", name=~".*(?i:$name_filter).*", category=~"($category).*"}[$__range])))
list.name: torrent

query.query: query_result(count by(name, hash) (last_over_time(qbittorrent_torrent_save_path{instance="$instance", hash=~".*($hash_filter).*", name=~".*(?i:$name_filter).*", save_path=~"($path_prefix).*"}[$__range])) * count by(name, hash) (last_over_time(qbittorrent_torrent_state{instance="$instance", hash=~".*($hash_filter).*", name=~".*(?i:$name_filter).*", state=~"($state).*"}[$__range])) * count by(name, hash) (last_over_time(qbittorrent_torrent_info{instance="$instance", hash=~".*($hash_filter).*", name=~".*(?i:$name_filter).*", category=~"($category).*"}[$__range])))
